scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm --prefix client run watch" "npm run srv-dev"
scripts.build: npm run srv-build && npm run cli-build
scripts.clean-install: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json client/node_modules client/package-lock.json server/node_modules server/package-lock.json
scripts.clean: npm run clean-coverage && npm run clean-build && npm run clean-install
